param.name: package_names
param.spec: text description='Build packages instead of image' label='Package' validationMode='any' display='normal'

parameters.param:
#!/bin/bash echo "Setup bitbake %variant_name%" mkdir -p $HOME/bitbake_downloads mkdir -p $HOME/bitbake_sstate mkdir -p build TEMPLATECONF="`pwd`/sources/meta-qtas-demo/conf/variant/%variant_name%" source sources/poky/oe-init-build-env `pwd`/build
cat > conf/site.conf << EOF
#INHERIT += "own-mirrors" #SSTATE_MIRRORS ?= "file://.* file://$HOME/bitbake_sstate/sstate-cache/PATH" SSTATE_DIR ?= "$HOME/bitbake_sstate/sstate-cache/"
ICECC_PATH="/usr/bin/icecc" ICECC_USER_CLASS_BL = " native" #INHERIT +="icecc" ICECC_USER_PACKAGE_BL = "libgcc gcc-runtime" CONNECTIVITY_CHECK_URIS="" DL_DIR = "${HOME}/bitbake_downloads" PACKAGE_CLASSES ?= "package_deb"
EOF

#!/bin/bash
if [ ! -n "%package_names%" ]; then echo "##teamcity[progressStart 'Building Image %variant_name% for %bitbake_image%']" source sources/poky/oe-init-build-env build set -e bitbake %bitbake_image% pwd find `pwd`/tmp/deploy/images/`echo %variant_name%|awk -F- '{print $1}'`* -type l -name *.wic|while read i;do echo "##teamcity[publishArtifacts '$i']" done echo "##teamcity[progressFinish 'Building Image %variant_name% for %bitbake_image%']" fi

#!/bin/bash if [ ! -n "%package_names%" ]; then echo "##teamcity[progressStart 'Building SDK %variant_name% for %bitbake_image%']" source sources/poky/oe-init-build-env build set -e bitbake -c populate_sdk %bitbake_image% echo "##teamcity[progressFinish 'Building SDK %variant_name% for %bitbake_image%']" find `pwd`/tmp/deploy/sdk/ -type f|while read i;do echo "##teamcity[publishArtifacts '$i']" done fi
